commit.message:
[MOVEONLY] consensus: move amount.h into consensus

Move amount.h to consensus/amount.h.
Renames, adds missing and removes uneeded includes.

verification.payload:
tree d786d12dffa41365c5e381a220454ab06f5eaff1
parent 419afa93419e6840f78cb94b4a39d826eb10e139
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1631327340 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1632958917 +0800

[MOVEONLY] consensus: move amount.h into consensus

Move amount.h to consensus/amount.h.
Renames, adds missing and removes uneeded includes.

files.patch:
@@ -498,9 +498,9 @@ crypto_libbitcoin_crypto_shani_a_SOURCES = crypto/sha256_shani.cpp
 libbitcoin_consensus_a_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES)
 libbitcoin_consensus_a_CXXFLAGS = $(AM_CXXFLAGS) $(PIE_FLAGS)
 libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES = \
-  amount.h \
   arith_uint256.cpp \
   arith_uint256.h \
+  consensus/amount.h \
   consensus/merkle.cpp \
   consensus/merkle.h \
   consensus/params.h \

@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 #ifndef BITCOIN_WALLET_FEES_H
 #define BITCOIN_WALLET_FEES_H
 
-#include <amount.h>
+#include <consensus/amount.h>
 
 class CCoinControl;
 class CFeeRate;

consensus: use <cstdint> over <stdint.h> in amount.h

files.patch:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 #ifndef BITCOIN_CONSENSUS_AMOUNT_H
 #define BITCOIN_CONSENSUS_AMOUNT_H
 
-#include <stdint.h>
+#include <cstdint>
 
 /** Amount in satoshis (Can be negative) */
 typedef int64_t CAmount;
